text: Karin Blauermel (19 September 1940 â€“ 26 November 2024), mainly known as Karin Baal,see Uta G. Poiger, Jazz Rock and Rebels: Cold War Politics and American Culture in a Divided Germany (Berkeley, CA: University of California Press, 2000): 102 was a German actress. She appeared in more than 90 movies from 1956 until her retirement in 2011. She was born in Berlin, Germany. She was known for her roles in Tired Theodore, Rosemary and Between Shanghai and St. Pauli. Baal died on 26 November 2024 in Berlin at the age of 84. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1940 births Category:2024 deaths Category:German movie actors Category:German television actors Category:German stage actors Category:German voice actors Category:Actors from Berlin
title: Karin Baal
